Mission_Viejo.Allied American University: Allied American University (AAU) was a for-profit university located in Laguna Hills, California, that offers online learning degree and certificate programs. Allied American University was founded in 2008 and received national accreditation by the Distance Education Accrediting Commission (DEAC) in that same year. The university offered bachelor’s and associate degree programs in business administration, criminal justice, general studies, and allied health.
